response.overview: Aidan, a cocky and sarcastic 17-year-old boy breaks into a house where, Jacob, a grieving father sits during his most vulnerable and dire hour. The encounter causes a strange, reluctant relationship to be built between the two. During this, Susan, a local church goer gleefully knocks on the front door and causes this new relationship to be suddenly torn apart right as it begins to be accepted by the two. In a state of confusion, police arrive and arrest Aidan, leaving Jacob alone once again, left with his dangerous thoughts, Jacob is given a glimmer of hope.
response.title: The Robin
